columns.name: name
columns.description: The resource name.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The resource identifier.

columns.name: job_id
columns.description: A GUID uniquely identifying the streaming job.

columns.name: job_state
columns.description: Describes the state of the streaming job.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: Describes the provisioning status of the streaming job.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type.

columns.name: compatibility_level
columns.description: Controls certain runtime behaviors of the streaming job.

columns.name: created_date
columns.description: Specifies the time when the stream analytics job was created.

columns.name: data_locale
columns.description: The data locale of the stream analytics job.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: events_late_arrival_max_delay_in_seconds
columns.description: The maximum tolerable delay in seconds where events arriving late could be included.

columns.name: events_out_of_order_max_delay_in_seconds
columns.description: The maximum tolerable delay in seconds where out-of-order events can be adjusted to be back in order.

columns.name: events_out_of_order_policy
columns.description: Indicates the policy to apply to events that arrive out of order in the input event stream.

columns.name: last_output_event_time
columns.description: Indicating the last output event time of the streaming job or null indicating that output has not yet been produced.

columns.name: output_error_policy
columns.description: Indicates the policy to apply to events that arrive at the output and cannot be written to the external storage due to being malformed (missing column values, column values of wrong type or size).

columns.name: output_start_mode
columns.description: This property should only be utilized when it is desired that the job be started immediately upon creation.

columns.name: output_start_time
columns.description: Indicates the starting point of the output event stream, or null to indicate that the output event stream will start whenever the streaming job is started.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: Describes the sku name of the streaming job.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the streaming job.

columns.name: functions
columns.description: A list of one or more functions for the streaming job.

columns.name: inputs
columns.description: A list of one or more inputs to the streaming job.

columns.name: outputs
columns.description: A list of one or more outputs for the streaming job.

columns.name: transformation
columns.description: Indicates the query and the number of streaming units to use for the streaming job.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
